scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern urban documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, muted desaturated color grade with cool blue-gray tones, authentic city commute aesthetic, realistic automotive interior cinematography

Scene Description: Young Professional - Uncertain Version sits in the driver's seat of Car Interior during rush-hour gridlock. Medium olive skin shows subtle stress, dark brown hair neat but uninspired, soft brown eyes dart nervously to the rearview mirror then away, avoiding eye contact with passing strangers visible through the tinted windows. He wears a crisp charcoal gray business casual button-down with natural wrinkles from sitting. His shoulders hunch forward defensively, head slightly bowed. Through the windshield, blurred traffic and faceless commuters pass by. The polished black center console and chrome details gleam softly in the muted interior light. His expression is guarded, vulnerable, withdrawn.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium close-up from passenger side angle, slightly off-center framing the subject in the driver's seat with windshield visible in background
Camera motion: Slow subtle push-in toward subject's face over 8 seconds, ending tighter on eyes and expression
Lighting: Overcast daylight filtering through tinted windows creating flat, neutral light with cool tones, soft shadows under eyes and jaw, no warm highlights, realistic automotive interior ambient glow from dashboard
Mood: Anxious and withdrawn, isolated in the crowd, defensive vulnerability, urban disconnection

Actions:
- (0-2 sec) Subject glances nervously at rearview mirror, eyes darting
- (2-4 sec) Quickly looks away to avoid eye contact, head turning slightly down
- (4-6 sec) Shoulders hunch further inward, hand grips steering wheel tighter
- (6-8 sec) Eyes drop to dashboard, fully disengaged from the world outside
scenes.audio_background: Minimal atmospheric urban soundscape, low rumbling bass representing traffic noise, sparse high-pitched synth notes creating tension, slow BPM around 60-70, building subtle anxiety with muted city ambience, contemplative and isolating mood, ambient electronic genre with documentary realism
scenes.audio_dialogue: Narrator (introspective, slightly melancholic voice): In the noise of the city, it's easy to disappear... to hide from the moment.

Medium close-up from passenger side angle showing real person late twenties male professional with medium olive skin tone showing natural skin texture with visible pores and authentic complexion, lifelike dark brown hair with realistic texture, clean-shaven face with genuine worried expression, soft brown eyes with authentic detail darting nervously to side avoiding camera, subtle forehead lines showing real emotion, shoulders hunched forward in natural defensive posture, wearing charcoal gray business casual button-down shirt with realistic fabric texture and natural wrinkles from sitting. Interior of modern luxury car with ultra-realistic black leather seats with natural texture, polished black center console with chrome details visible, tinted windows showing blurred traffic backdrop. Overcast daylight filtering through windows creating flat neutral light with cool tones, soft shadows under eyes and jaw, realistic automotive interior ambient glow from dashboard. Documentary photography quality, authentic human vulnerability in expression, natural depth of field with subject sharp and background softly blurred, 4K photographic realism, real person appearance in actual car interior

visual_effects.name: Shadow Smoke
visual_effects.description: Dark frames dissolve into shadow, perfect for mysterious/edgy brands. Dark mist subtly swirls around the subject creating isolation effect.
visual_effects.timing: Throughout scene (0-8 seconds), subtle shadowy atmosphere building around subject

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern premium product cinematography, shot on digital cinema camera with shallow depth of field, rich warm amber color grade with golden highlights, luxury automotive interior aesthetic, high-end commercial photography style

Scene Description: Inside Car Interior, Young Professional - Uncertain Version's hand reaches toward the polished black center console where a sleek matte black SunVue case rests. His medium olive skin hand with natural texture and subtle veins moves deliberately, fingers extending. The case sits prominently on the console's glossy surface, catching soft ambient light. His hand grasps the case gently, thumb pressing the latch. The case opens smoothly in slow motion, revealing SunVue Aviator Classics Sunglasses nestled in black velvet interior. The iconic teardrop-shaped lenses with mirror finish catch and reflect the city skyline visible through the windshield—sharp buildings, glass towers, urban geometry perfectly mirrored in the polished gold metal frame. The glasses gleam with premium craftsmanship, no smudges, perfect reflection clarity. Golden hour light begins to pour through the windshield, warming the entire scene, creating beautiful highlights on the gold frame temples.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Close-up hero product shot, slightly elevated angle looking down at console and opening case, shallow depth of field with glasses in sharp focus and background softly blurred
Camera motion: Slow smooth dolly-in toward the glasses as case opens, ending in tight close-up of the reflective lenses showing skyline
Lighting: Soft ambient interior light transitioning to warm golden hour sunlight streaming through windshield, creating beautiful rim lighting on gold frame edges, rich amber highlights on metal surfaces, premium jewelry-style lighting
Mood: Anticipation building, premium discovery moment, elegant revelation, promise of transformation

Actions:
- (0-2 sec) Hand enters frame reaching toward case on console
- (2-4 sec) Fingers grasp case, thumb presses latch with tactile detail
- (4-6 sec) Case opens in slow motion revealing glasses, velvet interior visible
- (6-8 sec) Golden hour light hits the mirror lenses, skyline reflection becomes vivid and sharp, frame gleams
scenes.audio_background: Elegant minimal piano melody with warm strings, sophisticated and premium feel, slow tempo around 75 BPM, building gentle anticipation, rich harmonic progressions suggesting luxury and quality, subtle ambient textures creating intimacy, contemporary classical meets cinematic scoring, refined and aspirational mood
scenes.first_frame_image_prompt: Hyper-realistic photorealistic product photography, modern premium cinematography style, shot on digital cinema camera with shallow depth of field, rich warm amber color grade with golden highlights, luxury automotive interior aesthetic. Close-up hero shot slightly elevated angle looking down at polished black center console inside modern luxury car with ultra-realistic black leather seats blurred in background, chrome details catching light. Real person hand with medium olive skin tone showing natural skin texture, visible pores, subtle veins, reaching toward sleek matte black eyewear case resting on glossy console surface. Case beginning to open revealing iconic gold aviator sunglasses with perfect teardrop lens shape, ultra-realistic polished gold metal frame with authentic metal texture, mirror-finish lenses reflecting detailed city skyline with sharp buildings and glass towers, lifelike premium materials, nestled in black velvet interior. Professional product photography with natural depth of field showing glasses sharp in foreground and background softly blurred, authentic optical precision details, 4K photographic quality, real luxury product appearance with perfect reflections and genuine material textures

visual_effects.name: 3D Rotation
visual_effects.description: The frames spin smoothly in place, showing a full 360° view. Clean, centered, and perfect for showcasing frame design and details.
visual_effects.timing: 6-8 seconds, as golden light hits the glasses, subtle rotation showcasing the skyline reflection in lenses from multiple angles

visual_effects.name: Diamond
visual_effects.description: The frames transform into sparkling, faceted diamond—hard, reflective, and radiant. Perfect for luxury eyewear positioning.
visual_effects.timing: 7-8 seconds, brief moment where the lenses catch light and sparkle with prismatic brilliance emphasizing premium quality

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Cinematic dramatic transformation sequence, shot on digital cinema camera with dynamic lighting changes, warm golden color grade intensifying to brilliant white-gold glow then settling to rich amber tones, impossible magical realism meets premium fashion cinematography

Scene Description: Inside Car Interior, Young Professional transitions from Uncertain to Confident Version as he raises SunVue Aviator Classics Sunglasses toward his face. The iconic gold aviator frames with mirror lenses approach camera in slow motion. As the glasses make contact with his face and slide into position on the bridge of his nose, an extraordinary transformation begins—Innerlight effect activates. A radiant supernatural glow builds from within his chest, behind his eyes, emanating outward through every pore. His entire being illuminates with warm golden-white light that makes him look divinely radiant, as if confidence itself has become visible energy. Time appears to freeze around him while he glows—dashboard lights pause, particles of dust hang suspended in air, everything goes still except the pulsing inner radiance. His expression shifts from uncertainty to bold confidence mid-glow: worry lines vanish, eyes widen with newfound power, shoulders automatically square back, jaw sets with determination. The mirror lenses now perfectly positioned catch and reflect this inner light, creating a halo effect. As the glow gently fades, we see Young Professional - Confident Version fully emerged—same person but radiating charisma, making direct eye contact through the lenses with magnetic presence. The SunVue Aviator Classics sit perfectly on his face, completing his transformation.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium close-up frontal shot, eye level, centered on subject's face as glasses approach and slide into position
Camera motion: Subtle slow zoom-in during glow moment, emphasizing the Innerlight effect and his transformed expression, ending tight on eyes behind lenses
Lighting: Begins with soft golden hour light, transitions to impossible internal glow emanating from subject's chest and eyes (warm white-gold supernatural radiance), creating rim lighting and lens flares, then settles into warm confident golden light highlighting his face through the glasses
Mood: Magical transformation, impossible inner power made visible, transcendent confidence awakening, powerful metamorphosis, inspirational and aspirational

Actions:
- (0-2 sec) Hands raise SunVue Aviator Classics toward face in slow motion, gold frames gleaming
- (2-3 sec) Glasses make contact with face, begin sliding into position on nose
- (3-5 sec) INNERLIGHT EFFECT: Supernatural warm glow erupts from within chest and behind eyes, time freezes, subject glows brilliantly, particles suspended in air, expression shifts from anxious to confident
- (5-7 sec) Glow gently fades as transformation completes, shoulders square back, face relaxed with confidence
- (7-8 sec) Eyes make bold direct contact with camera through mirror lenses, slight confident smile, fully transformed presence
scenes.audio_background: Epic cinematic transformation score, swelling orchestral strings with powerful brass crescendo, electronic whoosh sound effects during glow moment, tempo building from 80 to 120 BPM through the sequence, massive dynamic range from intimate to triumphant, hybrid orchestral-electronic style, inspiring and empowering energy, magical fantasy meets premium commercial scoring
scenes.audio_dialogue: Narrator (powerful, resonant voice building to climax): But what if you could feel the shift... the moment everything changes... when you choose to be seen?

Medium close-up frontal shot at eye level, centered on real person late twenties male professional mid-transformation. Medium olive skin tone showing natural skin texture with visible pores, beginning to glow with supernatural warm white-gold radiance emanating from within chest and behind eyes creating impossible inner light effect. Lifelike dark brown hair with realistic texture catching divine glow. Clean-shaven face showing expression shifting from uncertainty to bold confidence—worry lines fading, eyes widening with power, jaw setting with determination. Soft brown eyes with authentic detail beginning to glow with inner radiance, making direct eye contact with camera showing magnetic presence. Shoulders squaring back in natural powerful posture. Wearing charcoal gray business casual button-down shirt with realistic fabric texture. Iconic gold aviator sunglasses with perfect teardrop lens shape, ultra-realistic polished gold metal frame with authentic metal texture sliding into position on face, mirror-finish lenses catching and reflecting inner glow creating halo effect around frames. Interior of modern luxury car with ultra-realistic black leather seats blurred in background, dashboard lights, particles of dust suspended in air around subject suggesting frozen time. Impossible internal supernatural glow (warm white-gold radiance) emanating from subject creating rim lighting and lens flares, magical lighting that appears to come from within subject rather than external source. Professional cinematic photography with natural depth of field, subject sharp in foreground, 4K photographic realism capturing impossible magical moment, real person appearance with divine supernatural lighting effect, genuine transformation in progress

visual_effects.name: Innerlight
visual_effects.description: A radiant glow builds from within the lenses, shining through. Feels powerful or magical—perfect for smart glasses or transformations.
visual_effects.timing: 3-5 seconds, supernatural warm white-gold glow erupts from within chest and behind eyes as glasses slide into position, creating impossible inner radiance

visual_effects.name: Freezing
visual_effects.description: Time freezes as glasses go on—breath becomes visible, motion stops. Perfect for showing the moment everything changes.
visual_effects.timing: 3-5 seconds, simultaneous with Innerlight effect—time appears frozen, particles suspended, dashboard lights paused while transformation occurs

visual_effects.name: Saint Glow
visual_effects.description: A divine halo of light radiates from the frames, casting wearer in pure brilliance. Premium and majestic.
visual_effects.timing: 4-5 seconds, halo effect around the frames as mirror lenses catch and reflect the inner glow

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Dynamic montage cinematography transitioning to iconic final frame, shot on digital cinema camera with rich warm golden color grade throughout, premium fashion commercial aesthetic with urban documentary moments, ending in stylized graphic finish

SHOT 1 (0-2 seconds - Downtown Stride):
Scene: Young Professional - Confident Version strides down busy downtown sidewalk at golden hour wearing SunVue Aviator Classics. His medium olive skin glows in warm light, dark brown hair catches breeze with natural movement. The iconic gold aviator frames with mirror lenses reflect passing buildings and crowds. He makes direct bold eye contact with passing strangers—a businessman, a woman with coffee, a street performer—each meeting his gaze with recognition of his presence. His charcoal gray shirt fits with authority, shoulders back, head held high. Urban backdrop: modern glass buildings, bustling pedestrians, golden light washing across everything.
Cinematography: Medium wide shot following him from slight side angle as he walks, handheld smooth tracking creating energy
Lighting: Golden hour sunlight from right creating warm amber glow, rich highlights on his face and frames
Action: Confident stride forward, makes eye contact with three different strangers who acknowledge him, lenses reflect cityscape

SHOT 2 (2-4 seconds - Rooftop Pitch):
Scene: Young Professional - Confident Version leads presentation on modern rooftop terrace, city skyline behind him at dusk. He gestures with natural authority wearing his SunVue Aviator Classics, even indoors the frames add to his commanding presence. Three colleagues in business attire lean forward, engaged, taking notes. The mirror lenses catch the warm pendant lighting above. His expression shows ease and mastery, genuine smile while making points. Contemporary office rooftop: glass railings, potted plants, warm string lights beginning to glow.
Cinematography: Medium shot from colleagues' perspective looking up slightly at him presenting, static framing emphasizing his authority
Lighting: Warm dusk light from behind mixing with warm pendant lights creating golden highlights, soft shadows
Action: Gestures confidently while speaking, colleagues nod in agreement, leans forward with emphasis, lenses reflect warm light

SHOT 3 (3-6 seconds - Sunset Moment):
Scene: Young Professional - Confident Version stands at waterfront railing at sunset wearing SunVue Aviator Classics, laughing genuinely with head tilted back. Golden hour light creates perfect rim lighting around his profile. The iconic aviator lenses reflect brilliant orange-pink sunset colors. Wind catches his hair naturally. He's completely present, fully alive in this moment—no hiding, pure authentic joy. Waterfront setting: calm water reflecting sunset, distant boats, warm sky gradients from gold to pink to purple.
Cinematography: Profile close-up shot from side, slight slow motion on the laugh, shallow depth of field with water blurred behind
Lighting: Spectacular golden hour sunset light from behind creating rim light around his silhouette, warm orange-pink tones reflecting in lenses, magical hour quality
Action: Laughs freely with head back, eyes crinkling behind frames with genuine joy, turns slightly toward camera still smiling

SHOT 4 (6-8 seconds - Final Hero Moment with Tagline):
Scene: Young Professional - Confident Version walks directly toward camera crossing glowing downtown crosswalk at dusk, urban lights beginning to illuminate. SunVue Aviator Classics prominently featured—the mirror lenses perfectly reflect the illuminated city skyline with sharp building details and glowing windows. He walks with head held high, complete confidence, direct eye contact with camera. The iconic gold frames gleam under street lights. As he reaches center of frame, he stops, faces camera fully. Text appears floating beside him in elegant sans-serif typography: "SunVue Aviator Classic—Never Hide." The scene holds on this powerful final image: his confident presence, the glasses reflecting the city, the tagline making the promise clear.
Cinematography: Wide shot from low angle as he approaches, then tighter medium shot as he stops center frame facing camera head-on, static final framing
Lighting: Urban dusk lighting—soft blue hour ambient light mixing with warm street lamps and glowing building windows, creating cinematic city atmosphere, key light on his face highlighting the frames
Action: Walks forward confidently crossing street, stops center frame, makes direct powerful eye contact with camera, holds position as tagline appears, slight confident nod
scenes.audio_background: Triumphant uplifting indie pop anthem, driving beat at 110 BPM, bright electric guitar riffs, uplifting synth pads, powerful drums building throughout montage, inspiring and energizing mood, reaching climactic finish with final sustained note as tagline appears, contemporary commercial style with authentic emotional resonance, celebration of confidence and authenticity
scenes.audio_dialogue: Narrator (warm, empowering voice with building energy): From that moment... everything shifts. Every interaction. Every opportunity. Every glance becomes a statement. This is who I am. SunVue Aviator Classic—Never Hide.
